function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionate impact of COVID-19 on Global North and South","Impact":"Increased inequality and hardship for populations in the Global North and South","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of resources, support for vulnerable populations, and global collaboration on public health efforts","Technologies":"Public health infrastructure, data analysis for resource allocation","People":"Populations in the Global North and South","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Inequality and positionality in urban environments","Impact":"Marginalization and obfuscation of inequalities within cities","Mitigation":"Promotion of social justice, empowerment of marginalized populations, and representation of diverse voices","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, data visualization tools","People":"Marginalized populations, diverse voices within cities","Owner":"Local governments, community organizations, media organizations"},{"Description":"Struggles to make sense of experience under COVID-19 in cities","Impact":"Psychological distress, uncertainty, and social disconnection","Mitigation":"Mental health support, accessible information sharing, and community support networks","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online mental health resources, social networking platforms","People":"Residents in cities around the world","Owner":"Mental health professionals, community organizations, local governments"}]}
